RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisabl e to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASTONESTHROWAWAY chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, inched away to the finish kept to task. GRAM fractious in the gate prior to the start, got checked near the half mile pole as rivals tucked directly in front as the leader took the rail in front of them, lost ground and position to the tail of the field as a result, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, showed good courage to kick on belatedly and secure the place honors. NICKY JOLENE chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, ran on to procure the show honors. GRAB THE GLORY coaxed from the gate, got briefly steadied at the half mile pole and in turn backed up rivals in behind her, chased along the inside, swung four wide into upper stretch and closed well to the finish. FOLLOW YOUR ARROW broke forwardly placed and crossed to the inside at the half mile pole forcing rivals to grab hold in behind her at that station, spurted away along the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared near the eighth pole, kept on to the end. SORORITY PARTY broke in at the start taking over the lane of RUN FOR YOUR HONEY and forcing that foe to steady at the break, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, offered up a mild bid but was outkicked. CHARITY FIRST coaxed from the start, got paused at the half mile pole and eased off as rivals crossed directly in front, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and made no headway. RUN FOR YOUR HONEY got steadied at the start as SORORITY PARTY broke inwards taking over her lane, chased just off the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, tipped four wide into upper stretch and offered no response. SHEZA BERNARDINI coaxed from the start, got steadied briefly at the half mile pole when outside rivals crossed over, chased just off the inside under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide for home and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Gram
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked 1/2p, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, good courage

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, brief steady 1/2p, chased ins, 4w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Bernardini
ENTRY.OWNER: Allread Neal M Englehart Jesse J and Langlais Dan
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, brief steady 1/2, chased 2p, 4-5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Charity First
ENTRY.OWNER: Parkland Thoroughbreds and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, paused 1/2p, chased ins, inside 1/4, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Nicky Jolene
ENTRY.OWNER: John Grossi's Racing Corp and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Run for Your Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Follow Your Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: crossed to ins 1/2, in hand ins, ins 1/4, collared 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Astonesthrowaway
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and SGV Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, up near 1/8, inched away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cla im Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT STROLL was last to commence, settled on the outside, ranged up five then four wide on the turn, made a bid coming to the five-sixteenths, was put to a drive into upper stretch, battled outside of the runner-up into the final furlong, took the lead into the final sixteenth and proved best under strong urging. GOOD SAM was coaxed to the front, lost the lead just inside the three-quarter pole then stalked on the outside, regained the advantage in the three path passing the seven-sixteenths, was asked some near the five-sixteenths then roused for more coming to the quarter-pole, led under a drive until near the sixteenth-pole then was overtaken while well clear for second. HONEY MONEY tracked the pace on the inside of a foe while in hand, was let out near the half-mile pole, chased four then three wide on the turn, dropped back into the stretch and tired. MISSY GREER was taken in hand while wanting to get to the outside early then moved up inside of a foe, took the lead just inside the three-quarter pole then showed the way, lost the advantage while inside at the seven-sixteenths, dropped back coming to the five-sixteenths and faded. QUARTER-MILE FRACTION WAS HAND-TIMED AND PROVIDED BY THE NYRA STEWARD

ENTRY.NAME: Missy Greer
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Flying P Stable Callahan Peter J and Flying Partners
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand early,mvd up,lead ins 3/4,rail,headed7/16,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked in hand,let out 1/2,chased 4-3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Good Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed to front,gave up lead,stlkd outside,3p,lead7/16,overtaken

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Stroll
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Schoenfeld Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,settled outside,ranged up 5-4p turn,bid5/16,up1/16,best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 89. Claiming Purse 41000. INNER TURF (UP TO $7,134 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Asse ssment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROVISION three wide in pursuit through the dog legged turn and then down the backstretch, tipped four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied in tandem with PARATUS latched on to his outside to engage the leader inside the final furlong, grabbed a narrow command just inside the sixteenth marker while dueling to the finish and gamely prevailed on the wire. PARATUS settled just off the inside near the rear of the field, tipped three then four wide midway on the far turn and came under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied dueling with the aforementioned foe through the final eighth, overthrew the leader in concert with his main rival just inside the sixteenth marker battling on gamely but was ultimately bested at the end. SPETTRO showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and got set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and was collared just inside the sixteenth marker, and ran on to preserve the show honors. GHOSTLYPRINCE bobbled at the break, recovered to track the pace along the inside from mid pack, came under light and brief coaxing just before cutting the corner into upper stretch, got paused in behind the leader down along the rail unable to tip out until URAGANO had backed away sufficiently enough to be roused near the sixteenth pole, then tipped out at that station to the two path late and was up for the last major share. MAMA BANNED ME two to three wide in pursuit from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the finish. URAGANO tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. GOOD RAPPORT three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. FATHER GLADO tracked the front three then two wide coming under coaxing with five-sixteenths to run, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. SCOTTO chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, cornered three wide at the head of the stretch, offered no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostlyprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble st, tracked ins, cut corner, paused beh foes to 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Uragano
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Father Glado
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mama Banned Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Spettro
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins 1/2, set down ins 1/4, collared ins 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Paratus
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p near rear, tipped 4w coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, duel, game, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Good Rapport
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Provision
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Gaspar John P
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, up ins 1/16, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 99. Claiming Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $32,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWENTY FOUR MAMBA settled off the pace, was roused while saving ground on the turn, came a bit off the rail in upper stretch, rallied inside foes to get the lead outside the sixteenth-pole then kicked clear and held under steady urging. LAFITTE'S FLEET settled at the rear of the field, was roused in the two path on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, gained into the final furlong and finished with good energy to garner the place. HAPPY FARM pressed the pace on the outside, drew even with the leader while in the three path on the turn, dueled with that foe into the final furlong, dropped back into the final sixteenth and weakened but held the show. EMERALD FOREST was well placed under urging, went two then three wide on the turn, gained under a drive into upper stretch, chased into the final sixteenth and was out-kicked then missed the show. CATCHYASOON was hustled to the front, set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied in the two path while still inside a foe on the turn, turned into upper stretch under solid urging, dueled inside a rival into the final furlong and tired. LOST IN ROME settled on the outside, was urged while moving from three to five wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, held a reasonable striking position approaching the furlong marker but flattened out and lacked the needed kick. WAYAKIN chased the leading duo on the outside then in the four path on the turn, dropped back into the stretch and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Catchyasoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead,inside foe,2path turn,dueled to 1/8,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Farm
ENTRY.OWNER: Anthony George Roman Lawrence P Emerald Upstate Stable CT Racing Basile Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,even 3path turn,dueled,wknd,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Twenty Four Mamba
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables and Acqu
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,roused inside turn,rallied,up outside1/16,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lafitte's Fleet
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R and Speranza Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled at rear,roused 2path turn,good energy,up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,urged along,2-3path turn,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lost in Rome
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,urged 3-5wide turn,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Wayakin
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Roman Lawrence P Shaby Selman and McGinnis Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duo outside,4path turn,retreated

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 7F Turf CR: 80. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to r un this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BILLY'S GOT ISSUES chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive chasing the leader home, then surged late inside the final sixteenth to get up in the last jumps to the finish. LUNA WARRIOR just off the inside tracking the leader in closest aim, widened away as a pair from the rest of the field, got set down spinning three wide for home and took over command straightened away into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat and was nailed in the final strides to the wire. FIRE BARON chased three wide down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. LAWFUL three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out eight wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly for the last major share. GOLDEN PURCHASE chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered no response. BILL OF RIGHTS chased along the inside down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the turn when tipping around the backing away CARPE CAPELLA, angled seven wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. MOONFLYER chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, tired. EQUALIZER chased just off the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, tired. RUN DIEM Z veered out at the start and was corrected getting directed to cross directly to the inside, showed the way in hand along the inside under some pressure from LUNA WARRIOR to the outside, quickened the pace and widened away from the field as a pair through the turn, spun two to three wide for home under threat and yielded the front straightened away into upper stretch, then tired in the drive. COSMIC STORM chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and made no impact. MOMENT OF INSIGHT chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, made no impact. CARPE CAPELLA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, retreated through the latter portion of the turn and went four wide for home, then folded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Baron
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w backstretch, ins turn, angled 3-4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Billy's Got Issues
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Adelphi Racing Club and Dark Horse Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, dug in, late surge, up

ENTRY.OWNER: Gabrielle Farm Scuderi Vincent S Imperio Michael Cotrone Theresa and Rodriguez R
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, cut corner, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2-3w 5/16, angled 7w upper, improved

ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp BlackRidge Stables LLC and Harlow Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, ins 1/4, no impact

ENTRY.OWNER: Monarch Farm and Wolf H Bud
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lawful
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 8w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, set down 3w uppr, up, edged away, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, retreated, 4w upper, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Run Diem Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out st, in hand ins, under pressure, 2-3w uppr, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.;O lder, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGELIQUE showed good speed from the inside and went to the front, lost the advantage briefly passing the five-eighths then regained the lead, vied inside of foes while along the rail on the turn, shook clear inside the five-sixteenths, extended the advantage in the two path into the stretch, drew away under a drive into the final forty yards then was eased up while much the best. CLOVER STREET broke out then was corrected by the winner, settled on the outside, was urged four wide on the turn then driven five wide into the stretch and safely secured the place while no match for the winner. TOSCONOVA BEAUTY bumped with a rival at the start, chased the early pace, moved up inside the three-quarter pole, held a very brief lead passing the five-eighths, vied between foes in the two path from that point, dropped back late on the turn then spun three wide at the quarter-pole, remained on her inside lead in the stretch and tired while able to get the show. LAVON settled off the pace, was urged three wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, drifted in inside the furlong marker and failed to threaten. SWEETIE was urged along on the outside, went five wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and was no factor. DANSEUR D'ORO showed speed then pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the three path on the turn, dropped back late on that bend, spun four wide into the stretch and capitulated. CHARGE NURSE bumped with an opponent at the start, dropped back under urging, raced between foes in the two path under urging on the turn and failed to respond. REIGNING CHICK dropped well behind, angled out near the five-eighths, went four then five wide on the turn, floated seven wide into the stretch, had the rider lose his crop near the sixteenth-pole and showed little. CAPTIVATING CARA was urged along towards the back, saved ground while inside of two rivals on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Angelique
ENTRY.OWNER: Siena Farm LLC and WinStar Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pace ins foes,rail turn,clear 5/16,drew away,eased up late

ENTRY.NAME: Reigning Chick
ENTRY.OWNER: Walder Peter R EKB Stables LLC and Surging Sky Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear,angled out 5/8,4-5w trn,7w1/4,lost crop1/16,showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Tosconova Beauty
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,chased,bid5-1/2,led briefly5/8,btwn,2p turn,3p1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Charge Nurse
ENTRY.OWNER: Allread Neal M and Langlais Dan
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,dropped back,2path btwn foes turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Captivating Cara
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,saved ground,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetie
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,5wide turn,6w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Lavon
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, urged 3wide turn, drifted in inside 1/8, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Danseur d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pressed outside,vied 3path turn,4p into lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Clover Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,settled outside,urged 4w turn,5w1/4,clear for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 6F Inner turf CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. INNER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 1 20 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Other wise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUTLAW KID just off the inside in closest pursuit of the leader, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun two to three wide for home, took over command at the three-sixteenths and edged clear under a drive to prevail. PINE KNOLL chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors while never threatening the winner. MAXWELL ESQUIRE chased just off the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, angled three wide into upper stretch, kept on to garner the show honors. RUNNINGWSCISSORS chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, offered up a bid swinging four wide into upper stretch, then flattened out in the stretch. SOUPER SUCCESS chased along the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. AFTER FIVE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. INTO THE SUNRISE showed the way briefly from the two path before taking to the inside, remained in hand through swift splits and came under coaxing near the quarter pole when under challenge for the initial time by the eventual winner to the outside, took the inside route into upper stretch under threat, yielded with three-sixteenths to run and weakened to the finish. BIG PACKAGE chased along the inside under coaxing with five-sixteenths remaining, angled four wide into upper stretch, made no impact. SEVEN SCENTS three wide in pursuit, got coaxed along three furlongs from home, angled six wide at the head of the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Package
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Runningwscissors
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, bid 4w upper, flattened out

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed along 3/8, angled 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed near 1/4, inside 1/4, collared, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 104. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winn ers Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TONAL IMPACT was hustled from the gate after being a bit slow into stride, moved up under urging then settled outside beginning before the three-quarter pole, was roused three then four wide on the turn, rallied five wide into the stretch, closed strongly to get the lead coming to the furlong marker, fought outside of the runner-up to the finish and prevailed under steady urging. KINETIC SKY was taken in hand early then tracked the pace, raced inside while off heels coming to the half-mile pole then shifted three wide, gained to make a bid late on the turn, fought between foes under a drive into the final furlong, drifted in while battling with the winner near the sixteenth-pole and missed while well clear for the place. UNCLE MOONLIGHT broke in and bumped with a foe while last away, moved to the lead then angled in while showing the way, vied inside on the turn, was urged under pressure passing the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage at the quarter-pole, battled under a drive into the final furlong and weakened but held the show. SHOOTERS SHOOT stalked the pace on the outside, turned up the pressure in the two path on the turn, was roused for more nearing the quarter-pole, took the lead at that pole then came under a drive in upper stretch, battled with opponents under a drive into the final furlong and tired. BUSINESS MODEL bumped with a rival at the start, settled at the rear, was urged four then five wide on the turn and failed to threaten. STAGE RAIDER smashed through the front of the gate prior to the start but was held in the stall, settled off the pace, was urged along passing the five-eighths, rounded the turn in the two path under strong encouragement and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Tonal Impact
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd up,roused 3-4w turn,5w1/4,rallied,lead1/8,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Kinetic Sky
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan Tanzman David and Speranza Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,tracked ins,off heels1/2,shift 3w,bid5/16,4w1/4,missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke through gate,settled,urged 5/8,2p turn,no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside,2path turn,roused1/4,3w into lane,wknd final 1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 9 7F Turf CR: 67. Waiver Maiden Claiming Purse 45000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROBYN AND ELI got brushed at the start by FOLLOW THE FED, who broke inwards, tracked the pace along the inside from just off the pace, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and advanced, cut the corner into upper stretch issuing a challenge for the front, took over narrow command straightened away, dug in dueling from that point to the sixteenth marker with the runner up before slipping away in the late stages to victory. RED BUTTERFLY dueled from the three path with PHINNEYS HARBOR to her inside, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole when shaking off her main pace rival, spun just off the inside into upper stretch under new threat to the inside, got headed straightened away into upper stretch, dug in dueling from that juncture through to the sixteenth pole, got shaken off in the late going while fighting on to be along safe for the place honors. PIMENOVA chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun three wide into upper stretch, kept on to procure the show honors. FOLLOW THE FED broke in at the start brushing ROBYN AND ELI, chased two then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and improved position for the last major share. DADDYSLILBOSSLADY got bumped at the start by the breaking outwards CAUSE I'M ELEGANT and in turn bumped the rear of STRIKING MELODY turning her out slightly, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then weakened in the late stages. ALTERINA broke a half a beat slow without incident, chased three paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn, came under coaxing nearing the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. MAGGIE chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, offered no response. CAUSE I'M ELEGANT broke out at the start bumping DADDYSLILBOSSLADY into STRIKING MELODY, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. BANDULU QUEEN four wide in pursuit, got coaxed along three furlongs from home, angled six wide into upper stretch and tired. STRIKING MELODY got bumped at the start by DADDYSLILBOSSLADY due to pressure from CAUSE I'M ELEGANT breaking outwards and in turn got turned outwards slightly, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. PHINNEYS HARBOR stumbled at the start, recovered to briefly press the pace of RED BUTTERFLY before advancing to engage her in head to head combat while along her inside, dueled into the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths briefly, got shaken off inside the five-sixteenths by her main pace foe and was placed to a protective hold along the inside nearing the quarter pole, was eased home through the stretch to the finish steadily heading for the outside hedge when brought to a canter, then was dismounted just after the finish line, got escorted by outrider and walked off under her own power.
